text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

KRATIKA GUPTA: I'm
from India, and I've

been working in the United
States for over seven years
now.

Before moving to
the United States,

I worked for Tata Consultancy
Services for about four years.

I believe in constant
learning, staying relevant.

Before enrolling in
product management program,

I completed my first
Stanford Online course on,

turn data into insights
with predictive modeling.

I was impressed by the
platform, engagement,
and online resources.

That's when I started browsing
other available courses

or programs to
expand my skill set.

When I found this product
management program offered

by Stanford, I could relate it
with my current role and then

where I want to see
myself in near future.

Stanford is not just
country's great institution,

but well reputed
across the globe.

Stanford Online
didn't let it down

and exceeded the expectations
by the finest online learning
courses and programs.

I have deepened my
skills and learnings,

which will eventually help
me to advance my career.

All the instructors made this
program engaged and exciting.

I really liked how they
have some real examples

in classroom training
included in the courses.

So if you are looking for
highly engaged courses,

I will say you should go for
Stanford Online programs.
